## Theorem \[Lebesgue Differentiation Theorem\]

### A random variable $X$ has a density $f_X$ iff the CDF $F_X$ is absolutely continous[^1] in every closed, bounded interval.

[^1]: <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Absolute_continuity>
